column2: caption=Blackwold's Roost from ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''

Arnorian]] ruin in [[Archet]]-Dale in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]], [[Bree-land]], ''The Ruins of Bree-land''</ref>  After Arnor was divided the fortress was held by [[Cardolan]]. After the fall of [[Arnor]] the fortress fell into disrepair. In {{TA
